name: Super Hop 'N' Bop ULTRA
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Pentium Memory: 50 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Storage: 52 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows ME Processor: Intel Core i7-6900K (x4) Memory: 128 GB RAM Graphics: EVGA GeForce GTX TITAN Z (x8) DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1000 GB available space Sound Card: A Goblin Sitting in the Corner Making Beeps and Boops With It's Mouth Additional Notes: Don't Microwave Metal
